welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Palmer Ranch, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Venice Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Venice Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport serves primarily private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
